address.addressline: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center

creation.date: Text converted and initial EAD encoding provided by Apex CoVantage, April 2005

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.abstract: The collection contains materials pertaining to the development and creation of 14 books.

item.bibref: Animal Crackers: nursery rhymes, 1998. CLC A871
Blue Moon Soup by Goss, Gary, 1999. CLC C1833
Girl in the Golden Bower by Yolen, Jane, 1994. CLC C1975
If Anything Ever Goes Wrong at the Zoo by Hendrick, Mary Jean, 1993. CLC C906
My Father by Collins, Judy, 1989. CLC C1800
The Patchwork Lady by Whittington, Mary K., 1991. CLC C429
Talking Like the Rain by Kennedy, X.J. and Dorothy, 1992. CLC D375
Time for Bed by Fox, Mem, 1993. CLC D378
When Mama Comes Home Tonight by Spinelli, Eileen, 1998. CLC D379

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains original art, research material, photographs, sketches, dummies, manuscripts, galleys, proofs, correspondence, publicity material, and reviews from 1986-2000 (bulk, 1989-1997). There are several oversized posterboards, that show the process of how the illustrator progressed from research material to sketches to the finished illustration, that were used at book fairs, schools, and presentations.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of children's literature and associated artwork. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

item.bibref: producer,Billie M. Levy; director, Paul Giguere. Children's books, their creators and collectors. Guest, Jane Dyer [videorecording], [West Hartford, Conn.]: WHC-TV, c1994. Dodd Video Cassette PN1009.A1 C458
compiled and edited by Pat Cummings. Talking With Artists. Volume 3 /, New York: Clarion Books, 1999.

controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Jane Dyer Papers Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Collection has been donated by Jane Dyer in multiple installments beginning in 1993.
